sn21.6:1.2: Atha kho ayasma lakundakabhaddiyo yena bhagava tenupasankami.
sn21.6:1.3: Addasa kho bhagava ayasmantam lakundakabhaddiyam duratova agacchantam.
sn21.6:1.5: “passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, etam bhikkhum agacchantam dubbannam duddasikam okotimakam bhikkhunam paribhutarupan”ti?
sn21.6:1.7: “Eso kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mahiddhiko mahanubhavo, na ca sa samapatti sulabharupa ya tena bhikkhuna asamapannapubba.
sn21.6:1.8: Yassa catthaya kulaputta sammadeva agarasma anagariyam pabbajanti, tadanuttaram brahmacariyapariyosanam dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati”ti.
